title: [Large-Scale] Automotive Electrical/Electronic System Fault Diagnosis Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic automotive electrical circuits and experience using simple diagnostic equipment
context.additional_context: Practical skill-focused education utilizing step-by-step digital learning environments in smartphone-centric limited technological settings

learning_goals: Diagnose automotive electrical system faults with 80% accuracy by following step-by-step guidelines of a digital diagnostic system
Identify causes of errors in complex electronic systems within three attempts by analyzing circuit diagrams
Improve diagnostic procedures by incorporating feedback at a rate of over 90% in projects of increasing complexity

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
